item.title: Prometheus 服务发现
item.description: 基于consul 的服务发现 prometheus.yaml ## 操作系统监控 动态发现 - job_name: 'os_system' #metrics_path: "/metrics" consul_sd_configs: - server: 127.0.0.1:8500 services: - os_system scheme: http tags: - "node" relabel_configs: - source_labels: [__meta_consul_tags] regex: .*node.* action: keep - regex: __meta_consul_service_metadata_(.+) action: labelmap 注册服务 方式一 curl ## prometheus 与 consul 配置之间的对应关系 ## tags - tags ## service - name ## label - meta ## curl -X PUT -d '{"id": "node-1","name": "os_system","address": "10.1.x.x","port": 9100, "tags": ["node"],"meta":{&quo
